storyInfo: Melantha lacks the confidence to serve as captain of Op Reserve Team A4. But with Cardigan's encouragement, she works up the courage to speak her mind.

attributes.content: Outside the Rhodes Island Training Room
Why are the lights in the training room still on at this hour?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Is someone in there? Woah... talk about a workaholic.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Ah, Melantha, good evening! You're hard-working as ever.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Did you just finish training? It's so late... Doesn't it seem like the Reserve Team's training sessions have been running later and later?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I'm glad that everyone is motivated, but your health should always come first.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Ah, um... thanks...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: It's okay though. Instructor Fallon has been managing my training regimen, so there won't be any accidents.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I see. Oh, right, have you had dinner yet?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Not yet... But it's fine, please don't worry about me...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: C'mon, don't be like that, you know how important it is to get your three meals!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: But that's easier said than done... The cafeteria might already be out of hot food, so if you want something fresh, you'll probably have to cook it yourself.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Is that something you can handle? Or, tell you what, how about I help out?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: What's going on here? You two are blocking the way.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh, Instructor Dobermann!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Instructor Dobermann! Franka!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Hey girly~ Long time no see~
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I didn't know you had so much time to make small talk, Klin. I assume you're already done with your work for the week?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: And what's more, you're offering to help cook for someone? Last time I checked, you still couldn't tell sugar from salt.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Ahaha, c'mon now, Instructor Dobermann, there's no need to rub salt in the wound, right?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Just a reminder, Binns was looking for you a moment ago.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Ehh? In that case, I'll be getting back to work then. Don't want to cause trouble, y'know. See you around, ahaha...!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Please don't tell the boss you saw me here!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Hahaha! You Rhodes Island folk are so funny!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Embarrassing. Can't believe that guy's still acting like this... What a joke.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Melantha, Klin didn't do anything rude, did he? He's not a bad guy, but he is damn glib... If he's bothering you, feel free to ignore him.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: N-No, he was very nice.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Well, I guess that's fine then.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Of course. I'd be on my best behavior too if I bumped into such a cute li'l lady~
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Eh? Huh?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Stop it, you.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Belay that evil laugh. I don't want you spooking my trainees.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh my...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Instructor, you're the domineering type, aren't you? Mel, is she always this controlling?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: M-Mel? Um... N-No, Instructor Dobermann is very nice...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: She may be strict, but I've always thought...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Do you hear that? She's complimenting you, you absolute stud. Does that make you happy?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Enough joking around. Melantha, Fallon's already talked to you about the Reserve Op Team's formation this time around, right?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: After talking things over, we decided to make you the captain. If Reserve Op Team A4 has no issues with it, I'll bring you the paperwork that needs to be signed tomorrow.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: So, let me in on a little secret. How many Reserve Op Teams do you guys have?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What makes you think I'd tell you that?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: What's wrong with asking, on the off-chance your lips were feeling a little loose?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Trust me, I'm just a little curious. For an organization like Blacksteel, Rhodes Island could cultivate all the reserve teams it wants and we wouldn't feel threatened.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Makes sense that you'd prefer to train up your own teams than rely on outsiders. I get it.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Oh, but, you Reserve Team kids look like you've got some troubles.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: What is it, Melantha? Did you want to say something?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Um, Instructor...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Is there not even any bread left...?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: (Admittedly, things ended up running a bit too late today, but there's no way around it...)
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: (The staff left a long time ago, and I couldn't possibly trouble others over something like this... Maybe I'll just bear it for the night and go to sleep earlier...)
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: What's wrong? Why are you standing here sighing all by yourself?
Eep!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Hwah!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Wh-Wh-Wh-What is it?! You scared me!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Oh... Merry, it's you.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Ehehe, that it is~
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: What are you doing over here? It's long past dinnertime, isn't it?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Oh, lemme guess, you haven't even eaten dinner yet? Are you hungry? Adnachiel made a whole bunch of sweets, and I was just looking for you! Let's eat together!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Oh right, right! There must be some good news since the Instructor kept you extra long today, right? Steward said you're gonna be our captain, is that true? And Steward also said—
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: —Gah!! Ah crap, I was supposed to keep that a secret!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Well, whatever, I already spilled the beans. Not like you can keep something this exciting under wraps anyway! So, is it true? I sure hope it's true!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Um... Merry, do you think I can handle it?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Instructor, I think... I'm not qualified to be the captain of Reserve Op Team A4.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I'm very sorry...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I hope Instructor Fallon and Instructor Dobermann will reconsider...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Woah, now I didn't expect this.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The girl says she can't do it. What do you think?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You're not gonna say anything? C'mon, why do all you serious types have to be so stuffy?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hey, Mel, who do you think is qualified to lead the team then?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Well, Steward thinks things through a lot better.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: During the last mock battle, we made three mistakes. Steward was the one who made up for them behind the scenes and won us a good final result. Everyone trusts him.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Ansel always pays close attention to our health, and he can often judge how we're doing and prepare appropriate measures even if we don't tell him anything.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Adnachiel, um, though I still can't tell what he's thinking, whenever we need firepower, he's always able to identify the needs of each teammate and launch attacks from the most suitable position.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Merry... Um, Cardigan, is energetic but not reckless. She always pays close attention to protecting the other members of the team during battle. Our formations are often centered around her.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I think all of them have what it takes to be a great captain!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: You know, everything you just said right now, is exactly what...
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: ...Actually, never mind. I'll let you figure it out for yourself.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: In any case, I won't rescind our decision for the time being. We have our own decision-making process.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But, Instructor!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Let's set this conversation aside for now. I recommend that you think this over carefully, ideally talk to the rest of the team, and then give me your answer tomorrow.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: We won't interfere with your judgment. Whether you're fit for the job, whether you can do it or not, these are things that you have to decide for yourself.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: However, I will ask you this one question.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Operator Melantha, what made you decide to go into combat?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I am familiar with the delicate and the aromatic.
I am familiar with the clear afternoon sun, the glistening of glass bottles, the rippling of smooth velvet, as well as other elegant, civilized niceties.
Of course I am familiar with these things, because this is how I spent much of my life.
But, I am not familiar with the blood-soaked battlefield.
Why did I step onto it?
Why did I choose to face such perils and assume such a heavy burden?
What is it...
What is it that I wanted?
Merry, I... am I cut out to be an operator?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: What the hell are you talking about?!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Huh? M-M-Merry, w-wait, calm down!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Wait, the table— Merry, stop pounding the table!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: What's important right now... isn't the freaking table!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: What do you mean 'cut out?' Melantha, why are you down on yourself? You're obviously the best, the cream of the crop!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Please don't say that, you know I'm not like that...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Hmph! I hereby declare that you don't understand yourself at all, and that I know you better than you do! You're not allowed to say that you're not awesome!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: If you still don't know why you're so awesome, lemme lay it out for you!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: First, you're always there training with me and helping me test new defensive tactics! You're super nice!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Second, you're always helping me put together my equipment, and even though you've never mentioned it, don't think I haven't noticed! You're super thoughtful!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Third, you always bring us delicious snacks to eat! You know exactly what flavors we like! You're super sweet!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Fourth, you helped me tie the Instructor's hair into little pigtails when she wasn't looking! You're super fun to be around!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: W-Wait, I never did that last thing!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Heh, see, nothing slips past you at all! Even Steward didn't catch that one last time.
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: So, even if that last one was made up, the reality is that you're super awesome, and that is an undeniable fact!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Any other objections?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Are we done now? See, not a single one of us thinks that you aren't cut out to be the captain!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: But ultimately, it's your call. Melantha, what do you want to do?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: What I want to do...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Can I really do this?
Do I have the ability... to live up to everyone's expectations?
I... I might have areas where I'm not good enough, and there might be a lot of things I still have to learn...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: But putting them aside, I... What do I want to do?
What is it that I want?
I want to be able to protect people. Not just be sheltered by my parents, struggling to communicate with my own family...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I'll give it my all! I'll do everything I can to become a worthy captain, and continue to grow alongside all of you.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Merry, are you... okay with that?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Isn't that what we've always been doing all this time?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Yes... Thank you, Merry.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Mmhmm!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Ehehe, I'm so glad you're finally smiling!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Okay... Looks like there shouldn't be any issues, right?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: They found the frozen food in the freezer and are heating it up now. What should I do with these sweets, Steward? Should I still hand them over?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Why are we still hiding over here anyway?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: I don't think we're needed here. Hold up a sec, Adnachiel, Ansel. Don't head over there yet, let them be alone a bit longer.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: I don't think I've ever seen Miss Melantha smile so happily before.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Steward's right. It'd be way too awkward if we just dropped in now.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: But, knowing the way Cardigan does things...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Woah! What's going on? Why's this thing not moving?
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Is this... the heating button? The connection seems a little loose, so maybe we should turn it this way...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Don't worry, I got this. I know just the thing, since basically all machines work like this!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: Heheh, watch and learn!
attributes.name: Cardigan

attributes.content: ...She's definitely going to break the food heater.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Please say something sooner next time!!
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Wait, Cardigan, stop! Don't touch that switch! And stop banging on that knob! Melantha, hurry up and stop her!!
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Ahaha, it's too late. That thing's done for.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: *Sigh*... There's no stopping them from making a ruckus. Just don't get hurt over there, okay?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: What's wrong, headache?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: ...Just a little.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Because your team ran up another bill for destroying a kitchen appliance? Or because of your new shy team captain?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: All of the above. Melantha still lacks confidence in herself.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh? Well, I don't think that's necessarily a bad thing either.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Compared to all those morons who have nothing but confidence without any of the skills to back it up, it's reassuring to be around some more cautious and reserved people, wouldn't you agree?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Plus, you heard what she said.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: She's been paying close attention to every single member of her team. Is that not what a captain should do?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It'd be great... if she recognized that.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Trust me, I'm never wrong about this stuff. Those kids are gonna be just fine~
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Ah, I just remembered! She uses a sword, right? How about, you give her to me for some training?
attributes.name: Franka
